amendment.description: To fully fund the No Child Left Behind Act in 2004 and reduce debt by reducing tax breaks for the wealthiest taxpayers.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 284 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 60.
Amendment SA 284 proposed by Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S3955-3964) To fully fund the No Child Left Behind Act in 2004 and reduce debt by reducing tax breaks for the wealthiest taxpayers.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 284 proposed by Senator Murray.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 284 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 60.
